testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Test Login function of a Banking application
testcase.system-out: Given Login url of the application..........................................passed When User enters username as "username".....................................passed And User enters password as "manager_password"..............................passed Then User should be logged in successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Creation of new customer record
testcase.system-out: Given Manager is logged in..................................................passed When Manager clicks New Customer link.......................................passed And Manager enters values in the given fields...............................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then New customer record should be created successfully.....................passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Creation of new customer account
testcase.system-out: Given Manager is logged in..................................................passed When Manager clicks New Account link........................................passed And Manager enters valid "cust_id" in the customer id field.................passed And Manager chooses a valid account type....................................passed And Manager enters valid initial deposit amount.............................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then New customer account for "cust_id" should be created successfully......passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Deposit amount in an active account
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed When User clicks Deposit link...............................................passed And User enters valid "account_id" in the Account id field..................passed And User enters valid deposit amount........................................passed And User enters valid description...........................................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then Amount should be deposited in the given account id.....................passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Withdraw amount from an active account
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed When User clicks Withdrawal link............................................passed And User enters valid "account_id" in the Account id field..................passed And User enters valid withdrawal amount.....................................passed And User enters valid description...........................................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then Amount should be withdrawn from the given account id...................passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Balance enquiry in an active account
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed When User clicks Balance Enquiry link.......................................passed And User enters valid "account_id" in the Account id field..................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then Balance amount in the given account id should be displayed.............passed

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Delete an active account

testcase.classname: To test end to end functionality of banking application
testcase.name: Test Logout function of a Banking application
